meanings.definition: The state or quality of being ripe.
meanings.sent1: The ripeness of the fruit made it sweet and juicy.
meanings.sent2: I could tell the ripeness of the banana by its yellow color.
meanings.sent3: The ripeness of the avocado was so perfect that it practically begged to be made into guacamole.
meanings.sent4: The ripeness of the tomato was like a burst of flavor in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The ripeness of the peach was so exquisite that it seemed to glow with flavor.

meanings.definition: The condition of being fully developed or matured.
meanings.sent1: The ripeness of her skills as a pianist was evident in her flawless performance.
meanings.sent2: The ripeness of the cheese gave it a strong and distinct flavor.
meanings.sent3: The ripeness of the joke was such that everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The ripeness of the relationship between the two characters added depth to the story.
meanings.sent5: The ripeness of the wine was so perfect that it left a lingering taste of sophistication.
